criteriaDocumentation.name: Non-text Content
criteriaDocumentation.intent: The intent of this Success Criterion is to ensure non-text content for accessibility compliance.
benefits: Users with disabilities can access content that meets Non-text Content requirements
Screen reader users benefit from proper non-text content implementation
Content is more accessible across different assistive technologies

epubSpecific: Ensure EPUB content meets Non-text Content requirements
Test with EPUB reading systems and assistive technologies
Follow EPUB Accessibility 1.1 specifications

automated: Run ACE by DAISY to check for automated violations
Use epubcheck to validate EPUB structure
manual: Open EPUB in a reading system with assistive technology
Verify Non-text Content requirements are met
Test across multiple reading systems

remediationGuidance.explanation: Update content to meet Non-text Content requirements according to WCAG 1.1.1 Level A.

manual: Open EPUB in a reading system with assistive technology

Test across multiple reading systems

remediationGuidance.explanation: Update content to meet Audio-only and Video-only (Prerecorded) requirements according to WCAG 1.2.1 Level A.

manual: Open EPUB in a reading system with assistive technology
Verify Error Identification requirements are met
Test across multiple reading systems

remediationGuidance.explanation: Update content to meet Error Identification requirements according to WCAG 3.3.1 Level A.
